name: interregional
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between different regions: Interregional trade is a key factor in the development of civilization. The hospital serves as the interregional centre for heart surgery.
More examplesFewer examplesAn agreement on interregional cooperation was signed in 1995.The report examines the local and inter-regional influences that helped to shape these patterns of production.The authorities claimed that the attack was an attempt to stir up interregional rivalries.These forces were at work at local, regional, and inter-regional levels.
